description: Join Amber Premium for an exclusive Investor Mixer at Central, Hong Kong, curated for our most valued investors, partners, and industry peers outdoor rooftop & best mixologist secured, chill vibe guaranteed. As the global leader in digital wealth management, we deliver a trusted gateway to digital assets for high-net-worth individuals and leading institutions. Connect with our elite team for exclusive platform updates, strategic conversations on market opportunities, and meaningful networking. 11 Feb - 8PM til late Invite only reach out to your AMBER friends for invites! Drinks on First-Come-First-Served basis. See you there!
